languages.text: "Интересно. Если я начну складывать чудовищные вирши и декламировать их при любой возможности, окружающие испытают столько же страданий?"
"Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"
languages.original_text: "Интересно. Если я начну складывать чудовищные вирши и декламировать их при любой возможности, окружающие испытают столько же страданий?"

traits.locale_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"
"Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"
"Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"
"Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"

languages.text: “真有趣。如果我也开始创作怪异的诗句，一有机会就背诵个不停，我周围的人也会经历同样的痛苦吗？”
languages.original_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"

traits.locale_text: “真有趣。如果我也开始创作怪异的诗句，一有机会就背诵个不停，我周围的人也会经历同样的痛苦吗？”

languages.text: « Intéressant. Si je me mettais moi aussi à composer des vers monstrueux et à les réciter à la moindre occasion, causerais-je autant de souffrance à tous ceux qui m'entourent ? »
languages.original_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant. Si je me mettais moi aussi à composer des vers monstrueux et à les réciter à la moindre occasion, causerais-je autant de souffrance à tous ceux qui m'entourent ? »

languages.text: «Interesante. Si empiezo a componer versos monstruosos y recitarlos a la mínima ocasión, ¿podré infligir el mismo nivel de sufrimiento a quienes me rodean?».
languages.original_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"

traits.locale_text: «Interesante. Si empiezo a componer versos monstruosos y recitarlos a la mínima ocasión, ¿podré infligir el mismo nivel de sufrimiento a quienes me rodean?».

languages.text: 「興味深いな。俺が事あるごとに恐ろしい韻文を作って歌いだしたら、周囲に同じだけの苦痛を与えられるってことか？」
languages.original_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"

traits.locale_text: 「興味深いな。俺が事あるごとに恐ろしい韻文を作って歌いだしたら、周囲に同じだけの苦痛を与えられるってことか？」

languages.text: "Interessant. Wenn ich beginne, monströse Verse zu komponieren und sie bei jeder Gelegenheit zu rezitieren, erleiden dann alle um mich herum dasselbe Maß an Pein?"
languages.original_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"

traits.locale_text: "Interessant. Wenn ich beginne, monströse Verse zu komponieren und sie bei jeder Gelegenheit zu rezitieren, erleiden dann alle um mich herum dasselbe Maß an Pein?"

languages.original_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"

languages.text: "İlginç. Korkunç mısralar yazıp her fırsatta bunları okumaya kalksam etrafımdakiler de benimle aynı acıyı deneyimleyebilir mi acaba?"
languages.original_text: "Interesting. If I start composing monstrous verses and reciting them at every opportunity, will those around me experience the same amount of suffering?"
